snippet: Jeter Publishing, whose first books are expected to be released in 2014, provides a partial answer to fans who have wondered what Derek Jeter plans to do once he retires from baseball.
abstract: Derek Jeter, New York Yankees shortstop and captain, announces a partnership with Simon & Schuster to be a book publisher; Jeter Publishing’s first books are expected to be released in 2014; endeavor provides a partial answer to fans who have wondered about the star's plans after baseball.
lead_paragraph: Jeter Publishing, whose first books are expected to be released in 2014, provides a partial answer to fans who have wondered what Derek Jeter plans to do once he retires from baseball.

headline.main: Jeter Prepares to Turn a Page and Publish Many Others
headline.print_headline: Jeter Prepares To Turn a Page And Publish Many Others
